text.autoconfig.chorus_links.title: Chorus Links Config
text.autoconfig.chorus_links.option.ench: Enchanted Golden Chorus Fruit Radius Multiplier
text.autoconfig.chorus_links.option.base: The effective radius of a Chorus Fruit when searching for the nearest Chorus Link
text.autoconfig.chorus_links.option.gold: The multiplier to the radius for a Golden Chorus Fruit when searching for the nearest Chorus Link
text.autoconfig.chorus_links.option.ench: The multiplier to the radius for an Enchanted Golden Chorus Fruit when searching for the nearest Chorus Link
text.autoconfig.chorus_links.option.enab: If 'true', the Enchanted Golden Chorus Fruit is able to teleport players inter-dimensionally
